Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via Division, Pulaski, Chicago, Cicero & Division, due to localized flooding near Division/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Pulaski, Chicago, Cicero, then resume their normal route on Division, due to localized flooding near Division/Kolmar.

Allow extra travel time.
